nodes.bodyText: Isn't client auth normally off, requested or required rather than simply on-off?
This follows the current KSQL client auth config which is binary, aiui.

Do we want to run all the tests in ApiTest with Tls enabled?  I would of thought that's a bit heavy weight given the number of tests in there will likely increase over time.  Is it not sufficient to test that a single pull query works, a single push query works, etc?

I caught a bug during development which only caused one of those tests to fail using TLS so I think there is value in running all of them. They run quite quickly currently and certainly compared to the integration tests run time is not significant, but if it becomes a problem we can revisit.
